title: I know he's on the VGU list...
body:
But Mordekaiser could **really** use a Dreadnova skin!
All his other skins are either different spins on the armoured fantasy warlord (Be it dragon themed, demonic or whatnot) or Pentakill.

What he lacks in his skin catalog is something Mechanic and Sci-fi!
Something intimidating that reeks of metal and power!
he could just be Dreadnova's Darth Vader...

Or, well..
Space Lord Leoric!
http://media.blizzard.com/heroes/images/media/wallpaper/space-lord-leoric_twitter.jpg

Yeah I don't have to spend money on this but honestly it feels like that's the only way I'm ever going to have a chance of getting this skin, since key fragment drops aren't super common and trying to earn S rank on champs isn't always going to be easy or clear, let alone having the stupid rule of waiting a number of days before you can get another chest through getting S ranks.

People don't really understand the system. 
These skins are given to champions who already have a tonne of Quality skins.

Annie was given the first one because everyone and their mum at least has one of Annie's other 9 skins. 
Vayne got the second one because again, she's insanely popular and anyone who actually plays her is going to have at least one of her 6 other skins, + 3 Chromas. 
Darius has 3 skins with new VFX already, + 2 remodels + 8 Chromas, and once again, he's insanely popular. 

You're really not missing out on much by not having that one skin for that one champion, because they have tonnes of other options available.
